Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Hofton Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Hofton Avenue runs east and west, parallel to the northern City Walls. Rosecrest Street heads south out of the intersection, passing along the western side of the Lyanden Castle. Rosecrest Street is the longest street in Oceancrest, stretching from the northern City Walls, all the way to the southern City Walls.
